name: I Can Hear Them Coming
description:
You receive a letter from your Aunt Ethel. She’s in danger, and she needs your help. Explore her cabin in search of clues to find where your aunt has hidden herself and what exactly she’s hidden herself from.

I Can Hear Them Coming is a top-down, pixel-art experience that will take players only a few minutes to complete.

I created this "game" to learn about Unity scene management, pixel art animation, and object states. If you have thoughts that you'd like to share please reach out to me on Twitter @calebjross

Instructions:

  • Use WASD (or a gamepad) to move
  • Use Enter to interact with the environment
  • Use Escape to Quite the .exe versions of the game
